content: Welcome to the most familiar face blackjack.fun signature campaign thread. Recently, They have launched their blackjack.fun v3.0  . Now they want to spread their latest promo everywhere in this forum by establishing a signature campaign. But this time they want to run it in different ways. I think you guys will like itRules and Requirements Opportunity to earn tens of thousands of dollars.Register blackjack.fun and their affiliate site https://partnersofblackjack.fun/ Copy your own affiliate link from partnersofblackjack.fun. Example of the affiliate link: https://imgur.com/a/btUPESN Choose a signature from below according to your rank, and put your affiliate link into the BBCode. No alt accounts are accepted. If we found any abuse you will not be credited your reward.Member to Legendary rank is allowedBlackjack.fun and me deserved the right of making any changes or end this campaign at any time. Participants will be paid directly to their blackjack.fun account.You will not get any reward if you don't make any application and don't wear the appropriate signatureYou can make constructive discussions in the blackjack.fun ann thread. but not compulsory.You can post anywhere in this forumNo minimum post , No maximum post. Payouts & Positions:You will be credited $50 in BTC per valid referral who will register under your affiliate link, make a deposit, and wager $30040% lifetime revenue from your referrals means if your
